Docs.summary: The namespace contains interfaces and classes that define immutable collections. These classes are supported starting with [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. Use them to build apps that target the desktop, [!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)] and Windows Phone 8.
